original_text: You can demand to get your money back from a foreign person. But if you have lent money to another Israelite, you must forgive the debt.
korean_text: 이방인에게는 네가 독촉하려니와 네 형제에게 꾸어준 것은 네 손에서 면제하라

sentences.original_text: You can demand to get your money back
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 돈을 되돌려달라고 요구할 수 있고

sentences.original_text: But if you have lent money
